mapper.sql: select t.client_id, t.pay_bill_item_invoice_sid, t.pay_bill_sid, t.vendor_invoice_record_sid, t.vendor_invoice_record_code, t.currency_amount_tax, t.remark, t.creator_account, t.create_date, t.updater_account, t.update_date, t.data_source_sys, u1.nick_name AS creator_account_name, u2.nick_name AS updater_account_name, t1.pay_bill_code, t1.handle_status as bill_handle_status, t1.agent, u3.nick_name AS agent_name, t2.vendor_sid, t2.company_sid, t2.fukuan_status, t2.invoice_num, t2.total_currency_amount_tax, t2.tax_rate, t2.total_tax_amount, t2.total_currency_amount, t2.inovice_code, t2.invoice_date, t2.paper_contract_code, t2.invoice_category, t2.invoice_type, t2.handle_status, t3.vendor_name, t3.short_name as vendor_short_name, t4.company_name, t4.short_name as company_short_name, t5.name as invoice_category_name, t6.name as invoice_type_name, (t2.total_currency_amount_tax - ifnull(t7.currency_amount_tax, 0) + ifnull(t.currency_amount_tax, 0)) as currency_amount_tax_dai from s_fin_pay_bill_item_invoice t LEFT JOIN sys_user u1 ON t.creator_account = u1.user_name LEFT JOIN sys_user u2 ON t.updater_account = u2.user_name LEFT JOIN s_fin_pay_bill t1 ON t.pay_bill_sid = t1.pay_bill_sid LEFT JOIN sys_user u3 ON t1.agent = u3.user_name LEFT JOIN s_fin_vendor_invoice_record t2 ON t.vendor_invoice_record_sid = t2.vendor_invoice_record_sid LEFT JOIN s_bas_vendor t3 ON t2.vendor_sid = t3.vendor_sid LEFT JOIN s_bas_company t4 ON t2.company_sid = t4.company_sid LEFT JOIN s_con_invoice_category t5 ON t2.invoice_category = t5.code LEFT JOIN s_con_invoice_type t6 ON t2.invoice_type = t6.code LEFT JOIN (select t7a.vendor_invoice_record_sid, sum(t7a.currency_amount_tax) as currency_amount_tax from s_fin_pay_bill_item_invoice t7a left join s_fin_pay_bill t7b on t7a.pay_bill_sid = t7b.pay_bill_sid group by t7a.vendor_invoice_record_sid ) t7 ON t2.vendor_invoice_record_sid = t7.vendor_invoice_record_sid
